EmailTemplate.name: 2019.10.07 - Pre Log In - Pangea Pod Hotel.Prelogin - Pangea Pod Hotel
EmailTemplate.subject: Check-In With This Revolutionary New Idea
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From Concept To Creation For a small business to be successful it needs support. Read how partnering with Grand & Toy helped Russell and Jelena Kling launch Pangea Pod Hotel – a new capsule hotel idea In B.C. From stress-free orders to prices that fit their budget, we’ve been there for them.
